oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chattanooga, Tenn., Georgia Monument, Chickamauga Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Halftone print of a cyanotype photograph of the Georgia Monument located in the Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park. Features a bottom white border, undivided back, and handwritten correspondence on reverse. January 28, 1907 postmark. [No. 121] Note: This postcard comes from the Catherine Berry Pilcher Avery Papers Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Chickamauga (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials; Trees
